reviewText: It's not what I expected at all, I'm sorry, but that's how it feels

Well, professor is not that much cooperative.
Teaching way is not so good and some topics still i am confused
More focus was on theories , instead students should be exposed to tools which are actually used for International Marketing.
Some of the content are repetitive. The first interview sounds "staged".  Some Korean reference ("noon sei" or something like that ) are non-value adding.
The course can be more precisely and aptly offered as despite doing the course I have a grey area in my head

Course will be more interesting & enthusiastic with live examples of different industries.

I really appreciate that you can watch the lecture videos at your own pace and that there's a wide variety of learning resources for you to absorb the content easily. Would recommend to give this course a try to get a good understanding of International B2B marketing

Thank you Mr. Dae Ryun chang videos specially introduction video & Boxing attire. Thank you COURSERA Management team to make learning Easy.

reviewText: perfect
very Good
Great teacher!

I am quite new to this learning portal and thus visited just few courses. Nevertheless I didn´t finish all of them because some were unfortunately quite boring. In contrast this course is so far the best I have seen. Professor Chang caught my attention from the first second. Course is very well structured, lessons and language are easy to understand. Lecture is very interactive, interrupted by short questions to maintain your concentration. Background is changing in order to keep your attention and desire to know more. Learning with prof. Chang is simply great fun!!!
